channel.title: Crypto News - SosoValue Research
channel.description: Latest crypto news from SosoValue Research

item.title: TD Cowen: Strategy premium is reasonable, Bitcoin holdings are expected to be close to 900,000 in 2027On July 22, The Block reported that TD Cowen stated that Strategy's (MSTR) premium is reasonable. After Strategy increased its holdings by 6,220 bitcoins last week, the number of bitcoins corresponding to each MSTR share increased by 20.8% from the beginning of the year. TD Cowen reiterated its $680 target price and expects the company to hold nearly 900,000 bitcoins by 2027. The report pointed out that Strategy continued to fund Bitcoin purchases by issuing new preferred shares, "stretching" and forming a capital flywheel effect. Analysts believe that the company continues to increase its holdings of Bitcoin through low-cost financing, and the number of Bitcoins per share continues to increase. This "intrinsic" premium is expected to continue for a long time, or even expand further. [PANews]

item.title: Futu Launches ChinaAMC Tokenized Money Fund, Exploring On-Chain Subscription and Redemption with Stablecoin Application ScenariosFutu Holdings (FUTU) and China Asset Management (Hong Kong) have announced a partnership in the Web3.0 field. Futu will be the exclusive broker to list tokenized money market funds issued by China Asset Management (Hong Kong) on its platform, covering three currencies: HKD, RMB, and USD. Currently, the HKD product has been launched on the Futu platform, and the USD product is expected to be launched this week. The two parties plan to explore a "on-chain" and "off-chain" dual subscription and redemption mechanism in the future, and support 7×24-hour on-chain trading and receipt services. In addition, Zeng Yuchao, Managing Director of Futu Holdings, said that after the issuance of stablecoins, Futu will support the use of stablecoins on the platform. For example, users can use stablecoins as platform balances or holding assets to directly buy stocks, and Futu will handle the fiat currency clearing and settlement process for users. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: PUMP falls below private placement price, nearly 30B PUMP from two major whales has flowed into exchangesAccording to Lookonchain monitoring, after the PUMP price fell below its private/public sale price of $0.004, the largest token holding address, which spent 100.00M USDC to purchase 25.00B PUMP in the private placement round, has deposited 17.00B PUMP to the exchange through FalconX, worth approximately $89.50M, and currently still holds 8.00B PUMP, worth approximately $29.58M. In addition, the second largest token holding address of PUMP previously spent 50.00M USDC to purchase 12.50B PUMP, worth approximately $71.37M, and has now transferred all of them to the exchange. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: LBank Points System Officially LaunchedAccording to official news, LBank has announced the official launch of its points system, where users can earn points through various methods such as depositing assets, spot and margin trading, perpetual contracts, KYC verification, and inviting friends. The first phase of the program will last for 90 days, and users can accumulate points for daily active behaviors. The higher the trading volume and the more friends invited, the more points will be earned. As another innovative exploration of LBank's trading incentive mechanism, the points system integrates the multi-dimensional drivers of "holding + trading + social fission," and is open and transparent. It aims to empower users at different levels, help asset growth, and promote a virtuous cycle of ecological co-construction. [Odaily News]

item.title: Institutions: Dollar may fall further as US economic growth slowsInsight Investment analyst Francesca Fornasari said in a report that the dollar may weaken further in the second half of 2025 as U.S. economic growth slows. She said that economic weakness could pave the way for further interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve. The dollar's continued decline as the world's reserve currency will also put pressure on the dollar. However, given the uncertainty of the U.S. policy outlook and the current aggressive short bets against the dollar, the dollar's decline should be gradual and moderate. (Golden Ten) [Odaily]

item.title: More Public Companies Turn to Bitcoin This Week As Corporate Adoption RisesCorporate Bitcoin adoption is gaining momentum, as more publicly listed companies worldwide are shifting their treasury strategies from cash to digital assets. Although investor sentiment varies, the overall market is witnessing growing institutional alignment with Bitcoin as a reserve and strategic asset. Bitcoin Adoption Accelerates as Firms Embrace BTC MicroStrategy (MSTR) remains a notable leader in corporate Bitcoin adoption . The firm recently announced plans to issue 5.00 million Series A STRC preferred shares to raise capital for additional BTC purchases . The capital is intended for working capital needs and explicitly aligns with a long-term Bitcoin reserve strategy . Beyond MicroStrategy, other companies are actively adopting Bitcoin on their balance sheets. US-listed Profusa secured a $100.00 million equity credit line to build a Bitcoin reserve. Similarly, EV startup Volcon acquired over 280 BTC and completed a $500.00 million private funding round to support further accumulation. In Europe, Swedish-listed H100 Group increased its holdings to over 510 BTC after purchasing an additional 140 BTC. Perhaps the most symbolic move comes from Grupo Murano, a major real estate conglomerate in Mexico, which declared Bitcoin a “core strategic asset” with an initial investment of $1.00 billion. This shows a growing corporate consensus that Bitcoin is more than a speculative tool—it is becoming part of global financial policy. Market Signals Support Confidence Recent data shows that public companies’ net purchases of Bitcoin reached $953.00 million last week alone, with MSTR accounting for over $700.00 million. This surge coincides with a sharp increase in Google Trends searches for “ Buy Bitcoin ,” suggesting a revival of retail interest alongside institutional momentum. Overall, corporate Bitcoin adoption reflects a broader financial paradigm shift. Bitcoin is no longer treated as a fringe or experimental asset. From tech to real estate, businesses are increasingly incorporating Bitcoin into their treasury models, not only for diversification but also as a hedge and a symbol of forward-thinking strategy.

item.title: Ave.ai recently launched a series of tools to accelerate its expansion into the Southeast Asian market.On July 20th, Kuala Lumpur Blockchain Week 2025 in Kuala Lumpur, Southeast Asia, kicked off. Ave.ai, a leading on-chain aggregation trading platform, consecutively sponsored three high-profile side events: The MAGNE.AI Launch Night, the Holder Appreciation Reception, and the ANOME Pool Party. This series of events brought together many industry leaders to discuss in-depth cutting-edge topics such as on-chain transaction efficiency innovation, user-friendly product design, sustainable ecosystem construction, the survival status of P traders, and on-chain tool development. Attendees pointed out that current on-chain data analysis is evolving from professional tools to inclusive infrastructure, and Ave.ai's recently launched Signal Square and real-time monitoring system are accelerating this process. "We are witnessing the explosive growth of the Southeast Asian Web3 market," said the Ave.ai BD representative in his speech at the ANOME pool party. "By supporting community development and user education practices, Ave.ai will continue to empower the on-chain data transaction process." The blockchain week-related side events attracted more than 2,000 participants in total. [Odaily News]

item.title: Shanghai: Developing AI+AR, AI+MR and other multi-form eyewear productsOn July 22, the Shanghai Municipal Economic and Information Commission issued the "Shanghai Next Generation Display Industry High-Quality Development Action Plan (2026-2030)". It pointed out that smart glasses will drive display technology innovation. Actively deploy smart glasses production capacity and build intelligent and unmanned production lines. Develop multi-form glasses products such as AI+AR and AI+MR, and cultivate a multi-technical micro-display ecosystem with terminal integration. Focusing on the actual needs of the consumer market, focusing on key technical indicators such as lightweight, low power consumption, high resolution, and large field of view, promote iterative innovation of key components such as display devices, waveguide lenses, and core chips, and continuously improve product performance. Encourage innovation in product models and glasses forms for the next generation of silicon-based micro-displays, and accelerate the development of full-color, portable smart glasses products. [PANews]

item.title: Figma plans to raise $1.0 billion in IPO, holds Bitcoin ETF, and plans to issue blockchain stocksAccording to the Financial Times, design software company Figma has officially submitted IPO documents to the US SEC, planning to issue approximately 40.00 million shares at a price of $25–28 per share, with a fundraising scale of up to $1.00 billion and a maximum valuation of $16.50 billion (fully diluted). Figma disclosed in the documents that it currently holds approximately $70.00 million in Bitcoin ETFs and plans to increase its investment in the coming months. In addition, the company has been authorized to issue Blockchain Common Stock. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: 071labs makes strategic investment in Bitcoin scaling project NubitOn July 22, 071labs announced a strategic investment in Nubit, a core infrastructure project for Bitcoin expansion. Nubit is committed to improving the scalability, usability and openness of the Bitcoin ecosystem, and as a core contributor, developed Thunderbolt, a native soft fork of Bitcoin. Thunderbolt significantly improves Bitcoin's transaction throughput through key technologies such as UTXO bundling and OP_CAT, and realizes native support for on-chain applications such as smart contracts, asset issuance and DeFi. As of July 2025, the Thunderbolt mainnet transaction volume has exceeded 4 million, with more than 5,000 daily active users. [PANews]

item.title: Bitget Wallet Partners with MoonPay to Launch Fiat Currency Withdrawal Function, Supporting PayPal and Bank Card PaymentsBitget Wallet has announced a partnership with MoonPay to officially launch its fiat currency withdrawal feature, allowing users to directly convert crypto assets into fiat currency for withdrawal within the wallet, without relying on centralized exchanges. Currently, it officially supports over 25 fiat currencies, including USD, GBP, EUR, AUD, etc., and supports bank card or PayPal payments. [Odaily星球日报]

At that time, HTX DAO Core Builder Liu Ye will join hands with DaDa, Mao Maojie, Song, Michael, Qiu Rong, Big Cousin, Xiaozhi and other HTX DAO builders to jointly study the Huobi HTX semi-annual report and conduct a forward-looking outlook on the development blueprint for the second half of the year. This event will be broadcast live on Huobi, with massive airdrops, so stay tuned. Register for the live broadcast: https://t.co/pbCklx4bDz

item.title:
SpaceX moves $150 million in bitcoin after three-year dormancy: ArkhamOn Tuesday, Elon Musk's aerospace company SpaceX moved its crypto holdings for the first time in three years.
According to Arkham Intelligence data, SpaceX-linked wallet address "15oKQ…7Jf1G" moved 1,308 BTC ($150 million) to a new address "bc1q8…hartf."
This marks the company's first crypto transaction since June 10, 2022, a period during which the firm regularly sent multiple batches of about 1,200 BTC to Coinbase. Between May 25 and June 10, 2022, SpaceX transferred 17,314 BTC to the cryptocurrency exchange.
SpaceX did not officially announce the crypto transaction nor reveal the reason for moving the bitcoin. The Block has reached out to the company for comments.
Following the latest transaction, SpaceX currently holds 6,977 BTC, worth $825 million, according to Arkham. Tesla, another company owned by Musk, holds 11,509 BTC ($1.36 billion).
Last month, Arkham wrote on X that Tesla and SpaceX held over $2 billion in bitcoin, which was acquired at an average price of around $32,000. "Combined, Elon’s companies are up almost $1.5 BILLION on bitcoin," Arkham wrote.
Tuesday's Bitcoin movement from SpaceX coincides with accelerating mainstream adoption of bitcoin and crypto, significantly boosted by President Donald Trump's strong pro-crypto stance and recent advancements in crypto-friendly legislation. This trend has prompted numerous traditional finance firms to establish corporate bitcoin treasuries or launch crypto-infused services.
Meanwhile, Musk, a former close ally of Trump prior to their public fallout, recently announced the formation of the "America Party," a new political entity aiming to challenge the two-party system. Musk stated on X that his new party would support bitcoin. [Arkham Intelligence]
